sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Family Farm Assistance Act.

sections.heading: Purpose.
sections.text:
The purpose of this Act is to assist eligible
farmers, farm families and farm workers who are dislocated from their farms
due to farm closings or layoffs caused by business slowdown or failure.

sections.heading: Powers. The Department has the following powers:
